reviews.review: Гавно читы,казино,и т.д Кроче не играйте

This game as an incredible skill ceiling, and it is a lot of fun to play!!! Would like it more if free to play was non prime only and you have to pay for prime as to try and minimize hacking and smurfing. Other than that, really awesome game, used to play it when you had to start up Half life and select it from the mod list, lol
very niece game i reccomend yes

Дай Бог здоровья всем, кто играет в эту игру!!Отличные,добры, позитивные ребятки с хорошими манерами и приятным голосом. Дружелюбие и понимание преобладают в атмосфере игры!!

salty community but gameplay and skills required to play this game takes time to learn and master making the game very interesting as theres always something new to learn

A really good game with realistic graphics and controls fun for hours on your own or with friends. really recommend getting it.

So many cheaters, updates are not that interesting, "balanced" matchmaking, and last but not the least..... cheaters(again). I kinda hate the fact that this is free now. But beside all of that, this game is really good. Not pay to win unlike other games. Skin in CSGO doesn't add damage or any buff to the weapon or to you. Just classic CS. Over all, I'd give this game 8.5/10.
Игре уже много лет, конечно VALVE чуток портят игру и читеров много, а так геймплей в игре просто потрясающий, так что играйте.
